goal_name: A Nation based on traditional governance and Christian principles, which underpin our culture and continue to bestow life skills and knowledge to future generations
target_name: Preserve and enhance cultural and traditional knowledge, including appropriate medicines, natural remedies and healing practices
indicator_name: Proportion of population with ability to 1: produce herbal medicines, and 2: massage
